articles.title: About the Author
articles.contents:
I am a graduate MS in Business Analytics student at Monash University, Australia. I was previously employed as a software developer in Wipro Limited for 2 years. With a broad skillset from R to Python and Tableau, I am looking forward to more opportunities to enhance my experience in these areas.
I am heavily invested in learning visualization and analytics. I am passionate about innovative ways to present data as well as finding patterns that might be buried otherwise.

articles.title: ETC5523 - Blog Posts
articles.description: | A series of blog posts for ETC5523.
